citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The black alpaca's toenails are overgrown and misshapen, and all four feet are affected. The nails on the front toes curve
inward, and the rear toenails curve out laterally. In addition, the fleece appears to be matted with plant material on the
underside of the animal's neck.
The overgrown toenails may cause lameness and pain and lead to other foot and leg problems. In addition, the matted
fleece can cause skin irritation. The alpaca's toenails must be trimmed, and also maintained as needed. The licensee
stated the plant material has been removed from the animal.
Correct by: 2 JAN 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The black alpaca's toenails are overgrown and misshapen, and all four feet are affected. The nails on the front toes curve 
inward, and the rear toenails curve out laterally. In addition, the fleece appears to be matted with plant material on the 
underside of the animal's neck. 
 
The overgrown toenails may cause lameness and pain and lead to other foot and leg problems. In addition, the matted 
fleece can cause skin irritation. The alpaca's toenails must be trimmed, and also maintained as needed. The licensee 
stated the plant material has been removed from the animal.  
 
Correct by: 2 JAN 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
